#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define M 274877906944
#define m 274877906944
using namespace std;
 
ll modpow(ll base, ll exp) {
  base %= M;
  ll result = 1;
  while (exp > 0) {
    if (exp & 1) result = (result * base) % M;
    base = (base * base) % M;
    exp >>= 1;
  }
  return result;
}
ll X[1000005];

            X[i]=(X[i-1]*x)%m;

            sum = ((sum%M) + ((a+i*d)%M * X[n-i]%m )%M)%M;
            //sum=((sum%m)+(((a%m+((i%m)*(d%m))%m)%m)%m*X[n-i]%m)%m)%m;
            //sum=(sum+p)%M;
        }
        //if(sum<0)
